description: Classic jar symbol with two horizontal handles at the top of each arm pointed outward, three small vertical strokes in mouth. Three small strokes at bottom. Overlaid by a decorated caret

features.description: Are the left and right sides straight or bulging? 0 = bulging, 1 = straight, 2 = mixed or indeterminate
Width of the jar. 0 = narrow, 1 = medium, 2 = wide
What shape is the jar bottom? 0 = rounded, 1 = angled, 2 = mixed or indeterminate
Are the lips of the jar straight or flared outward? 0 = flared, 1 = straight, 2 = mixed or indeterminate
Do the jar handles droop? 0 = no, 1 = yes, 2 = mixed or indeterminate
In what direction are the small strokes? 0 = vertical, 1 = tilted right, 2 = tilted left, 3 = mixed or indeterminate
How is the caret decorated? 0 = not, 1 = two small upward orthogonals off each end
